department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Biological Oceanography
course.description: The ocean as an ecological system, with focus on environmental-organismal interactions that regulate plankton production and transfer to higher trophic levels. Specific topics include bloom events, the limits to fish harvest, and the effects of climate change on ocean systems. Plankton demonstrations and optional coastal research vessel day trip.
course.prerequisites: OEB 10, Physical Sciences 1 or permission of instructor.
course.notes: For biology and other natural science concentrators.
